4593.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|78|58$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|104|20$يُبَايِعُونَكَ|pledge allegiance to you|181|196|15869$إِنَّمَا|only|55|70|102$يُبَايِعُونَ|they pledge allegiance|168|183|15870$ٱللَّهَ|(to) Allah.|87|94|184$يَدُ|(The) Hand|95|108|15871$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|106|606$فَوْقَ|(is) over|76|101|2928$أَيْدِيهِمْ‌ۚ|their hands.|99|124|757$فَمَن|Then whoever|114|139|402$نَّكَثَ|breaks (his oath)|133|146|15872$فَإِنَّمَا|then only|82|98|1086$يَنكُثُ|he breaks|84|115|15873$عَلَىٰ|against|68|99|52$نَفْسِهِۦ‌ۖ|himself,|77|108|3094$وَمَنْ|and whoever|105|136|1012$أَوْفَىٰ|fulfils|69|100|3021$بِمَا|what|53|69|43$عَـٰهَدَ عَلَيْهُ ٱللَّهَ|he has covenanted with Allah,|221|244|15874$فَسَيُؤْتِيهِ|soon He will give him|157|202|15875$أَجْرًا|a reward|78|123|4008$عَظِيمًا|great.|84|106|3924$

4595.verse: بَلْ|Nay,|50|57|848$ظَنَنتُمْ|you thought|101|116|15270$أَن|that|48|63|655$لَّن|(would) never|112|127|524$يَنقَلِبَ|return|74|89|15881$ٱلرَّسُولُ|the Messenger|117|132|1278$وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ|and the believers|134|141|2585$إِلَىٰٓ|to|53|69|118$أَهْلِيهِمْ|their families|103|135|15882$أَبَدًا|ever,|54|86|4093$وَزُيِّنَ ذَٲلِكَ|that was made fair-seeming|205|237|15883$فِى|in|48|80|89$قُلُوبِكُمْ|your hearts.|101|117|3135$وَظَنَنتُمْ|And you assumed|136|143|15884$ظَنَّ|an assumption|115|129|3404$ٱلسَّوْءِ|evil,|78|92|7851$وَكُنتُمْ|and you became|129|143|290$قَوْمَۢا|a people|76|90|7943$بُورًا|ruined.`|73|80|12727$

4596.verse: وَمَن|And whoever|106|123|1012$لَّمْ يُؤْمِنۢ|(has) not believed|141|176|15885$بِٱللَّهِ|in Allah|67|102|79$وَرَسُولِهِۦ|and His Messenger|143|178|2497$فَإِنَّآ|then indeed, We|129|146|4856$أَعْتَدْنَا|[We] have prepared|153|219|3827$لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ|for the disbelievers|146|278|236$سَعِيرًا|a Blazing Fire.|112|178|3733$

4597.verse: وَلِلَّهِ|And for Allah|104|113|1070$مُلْكُ|(is the) kingdom|127|146|1005$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|(of) the heavens|132|151|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۚ|and the earth.|116|135|352$يَغْفِرُ|He forgives|94|113|3267$لِمَن|whom|58|67|1356$يَشَآءُ|He wills|69|84|867$وَيُعَذِّبُ|and punishes|106|136|2584$مَن|whom|58|88|76$يَشَآءُ‌ۚ|He wills.|74|104|867$وَكَانَ|And is|71|101|363$ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|83|123$غَفُورًا|Oft-Forgiving,|112|127|3883$رَّحِيمًا|Most Merciful.|113|113|3814$

4598.verse: سَيَقُولُ|Will say|83|89|1266$ٱلْمُخَلَّفُونَ|those who remained behind|201|214|7784$إِذَا|when|55|68|1370$ٱنطَلَقْتُمْ|you set forth|107|120|15886$إِلَىٰ|towards|73|86|118$مَغَانِمَ|(the) spoils of war|142|148|15887$لِتَأْخُذُوهَا|to take it,|105|113|15888$ذَرُونَا|`Allow us|82|98|15889$نَتَّبِعْكُمْ‌ۖ|(to) follow you.`|131|147|15890$يُرِيدُونَ|They wish|94|110|4112$أَن|to|44|60|655$يُبَدِّلُواْ|change|75|91|15891$كَلَـٰمَ|(the) Words|100|108|15892$ٱللَّهِ‌ۚ|(of) Allah.|86|96|606$قُل|Say,|50|70|765$لَّن|`Never|66|86|524$تَتَّبِعُونَا|will you follow us.|137|157|15893$كَذَٲلِكُمْ|Thus|82|102|15894$قَالَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah said|94|114|2920$مِن قَبْلُ‌ۖ|before.`|92|102|250$فَسَيَقُولُونَ|Then they will say,|146|156|8136$بَلْ|`Nay,|58|77|848$تَحْسُدُونَنَا‌ۚ|you envy us.`|114|133|15895$بَلْ|Nay,|50|69|848$كَانُواْ|they were|87|106|94$لَا|not|42|61|30$يَفْقَهُونَ|understanding|113|123|4223$إِلَّا|except|65|336|86$قَلِيلاً|a little.|67|338|433$

4593.verse: Indeed, those who pledge allegiance to you, [O Muhammad] - they are actually pledging allegiance to Allah. The hand of Allah is over their hands. So he who breaks his word only breaks it to the detriment of himself. And he who fulfills that which he has promised Allah - He will give him a great reward.

4594.verse: Those who remained behind of the bedouins will say to you, "Our properties and our families occupied us, so ask forgiveness for us." They say with their tongues what is not within their hearts. Say, "Then who could prevent Allah at all if He intended for you harm or intended for you benefit? Rather, ever is Allah, with what you do, Acquainted.

4595.verse: But you thought that the Messenger and the believers would never return to their families, ever, and that was made pleasing in your hearts. And you assumed an assumption of evil and became a people ruined."

4596.verse: And whoever has not believed in Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers a Blaze.

4597.verse: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. He forgives whom He wills and punishes whom He wills. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.

4598.verse: Those who remained behind will say when you set out toward the war booty to take it, "Let us follow you." They wish to change the words of Allah. Say, "Never will you follow us. Thus did Allah say before." So they will say, "Rather, you envy us." But [in fact] they were not understanding except a little.
